content:
Dear @RalfJ and @oli

It would appear that the Miri cron job build failed. Would you mind investigating this issue?

Thanks in advance!
Sincerely,
The Miri Cronjobs Bot

unexpected errors (from JSON output): [
    Error {
        line_num: 9,
        kind: Some(
            Error,
        ),
        msg: "9:5: 9:28: Undefined Behavior: type validation failed: encountered a null reference",
    },
]

not found errors (from test file): [
    Error {
        line_num: 9,
        kind: Some(
            Error,
        ),
        msg: "encountered a NULL reference",
    },
]

NULL -> null
